name: Air Paper Glider - Plane Fun
description:
Air Paper Glider - Plane Fun
is an awesome little game that turns a bit of basic physics into an incredible amount of fun! With adorable graphics and sounds, Paper Plane Fun brings into your hands the quest of a determined little Paper Plane who must make it to the safety of a pail of water while avoiding nasty, though equally cute odds.

Collect stars and beat your own previously set records as you help the little Paper Plane escape eminent explosion at the prickles of mean smirking cactus. Face new challenging levels while employing quick thinking and a variety of skills that keep enhancing as the game progresses. Never has physics been this enjoyable. Hours and hours of fun enjoy.
